name: Dungeon Game (DungeonGame1)
description:
Game engine: Unity
Pathfinding: A* Pathfinding Free version
Codebase: C#

Most of the rooms in the game are procedurally generated on the exception of starting room, shop room and final boss room. All the object in the rooms besides these mentioned rooms are also procedurally generated making the possibility of having of hundreds and hundreds of playable rooms of which none are exactly a like.

Getting Started Prerequisites

OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Windows 10
CPU: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
Graphics API: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
Additional requirements: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.

The game has not been tested on Linux or Mac, user may try to run the downloaded game on said operation systems, but we cannot guarantee the game will work as intended.

Installation

Download the game files, extract the zip file and run DungeonGame.exe
